title: Visual Learning Modeling for MOOC-Based Blended Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced mathematical theories and practical application experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment to enhance job relevance for in-service professionals, requiring guaranteed accessibility via smartphone-centric approaches

learning_goals: Learners can analyze blended learning structures with ≥80% accuracy using a visual design model integrating MOOCs and face-to-face instruction
Learners can produce ≥3 actionable blended learning scenarios within one month using visual design tools
Learners demonstrate optimization proficiency by revising learning design elements ≥3 times based on formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
